languages.text: {n}Теодора хмыкает.{/n} "Сдача предложенной инициативы, прискорбная покорность — даже учитывая твое подчиненное положение. Впрочем, эта болезнь одинакова для всех, кто привык к существованию в объятиях {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империума{/g}. Нерушимая иерархия, бесспорное подчинение, лизоблюдство и стремление угодить... забудь об этом. С того момента, как за тобой явились мои посланцы, старые правила не имеют значения".

traits.locale_text: {n}Теодора хмыкает.{/n} "Сдача предложенной инициативы, прискорбная покорность – даже учитывая твое подчиненное положение. Впрочем, эта болезнь одинакова для всех, кто привык к существованию в объятиях {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империума{/g}. Нерушимая иерархия, бесспорное подчинение, лизоблюдство и стремление угодить… забудь об этом. С того момента, как за тобой явились мои посланцы, старые правила не имеют значения".

languages.text: {n}Theodora scoffs.{/n} "You have ceded the opening that was offered to you in a woeful display of meekness. Admittedly, this tendency is equally strong in all who toil in the Emperor's service. Immutable hierarchy, absolute obedience, lickspittlery, compulsion to please... I value none of these things. From the moment my envoys came for you, the terms of your existence changed."{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}{/g}
languages.original_text: {n}Теодора хмыкает.{/n} "Сдача предложенной инициативы, прискорбная покорность — даже учитывая твое подчиненное положение. Впрочем, эта болезнь одинакова для всех, кто привык к существованию в объятиях {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империума{/g}. Нерушимая иерархия, бесспорное подчинение, лизоблюдство и стремление угодить... забудь об этом. С того момента, как за тобой явились мои посланцы, старые правила не имеют значения".

traits.locale_text: {n}Theodora scoffs.{/n} "You give up the initiative that is being offered to you, and you display woeful obedience — even considering your subservient position. Admittedly, this disease is equally strong in all who are accustomed to the existence in the hold of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. Immutable hierarchy, indisputable submission, lickspittlery, compulsion to please... forget it all. From the moment my envoys came for you, old rules mattered no longer."

{n}Theodora scoffs.{/n} "You give up the initiative that is being offered to you, and you display woeful obedience — even considering your subservient position. Admittedly, this disease is equally strong in all who are accustomed to the existence in the hold of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. Immutable hierarchy, indisputable submission, lickspittlery, compulsion to please... forget it all. From the moment my envoys came for you, old rules mattered no longer."

{n}Theodora scoffs.{/n} "You have ceded the opening that was offered to you and displayed woeful meekness, even for one of inferior rank. Admittedly, this affliction is equally strong in all who are inured to existence in the grip of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. Immutable hierarchy, absolute obedience, lickspittlery, compulsion to please... forget all of that. From the moment my envoys came for you, the old rules ceased to matter."

{n}Theodora scoffs.{/n} "You have ceded the opening that was offered to you and displayed woeful meekness, even for one of inferior rank. Admittedly, this affliction is equally strong in all who are inured to existence in the grip of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. Immutable hierarchy, absolute obedience, lickspittlery, compulsion to please... forget all of that. From the moment my envoys came for you, the old rules ceased to matter."

{n}Theodora scoffs.{/n} "You have ceded the opening that was offered to you and displayed woeful meekness, even for one of inferior rank. Admittedly, this affliction is equally strong in all who are inured to existence in the grip of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. Immutable hierarchy, absolute obedience, lickspittlery, compulsion to please... forget all of that. From the moment my envoys came for you, the old rules ceased to matter."

{n}Theodora scoffs.{/n} "You have ceded the opening that was offered to you in a woeful display of meekness. Admittedly, this tendency is equally strong in all who toil in the Emperor's service. Immutable hierarchy, absolute obedience, lickspittlery, compulsion to please... I value none of these things. From the moment my envoys came for you, the terms of your existence changed."

languages.text: {n}西奥多拉嘲笑道。{/n}“你的答复充满了可悲的温顺，将提供给你的机会拱手相让。无可否认，那些习惯于在帝国的铁腕之下生存的人，都是这个样子。一成不变的等级制度、绝对的服从、被迫拍别人的马屁……但我并不看中这些。从我的特使站在你面前的那一刻起，你的人生就不一样了。”{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}{/g}
languages.original_text: {n}Theodora scoffs.{/n} "You have ceded the opening that was offered to you in a woeful display of meekness. Admittedly, this tendency is equally strong in all who toil in the Emperor's service. Immutable hierarchy, absolute obedience, lickspittlery, compulsion to please... I value none of these things. From the moment my envoys came for you, the terms of your existence changed."{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}{/g}

traits.locale_text: {n}西奥多拉嘲笑道。{/n}“虽然你的级别确实比较低，但你这样的答复充满了可悲的温顺，相当于放弃了提供给你的机会。无可否认，对那些习惯于在{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}的铁腕之下生存的人而言，每个人都带着这种可悲的温顺。一成不变的等级制度、绝对的服从、被迫拍别人的马屁……把这一切都忘掉吧。从我的特使站在你面前的那一刻起，以往的那些规则就已经不再重要了。”

languages.text: {n}Theodora ríe, burlona.{/n} «Has cedido la oportunidad que se te ofrecía en una lamentable exhibición de sumisión. También es cierto que esta tendencia es muy fuerte en todos cuantos sirven al Emperador. Una jerarquía inmutable, una obediencia absoluta, adulación, deseos de agradar... nada de eso me sirve para nada. Desde que mis enviados han acudido a buscarte, tu existencia ha cambiado».{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}{/g}
languages.original_text: {n}Theodora scoffs.{/n} "You have ceded the opening that was offered to you in a woeful display of meekness. Admittedly, this tendency is equally strong in all who toil in the Emperor's service. Immutable hierarchy, absolute obedience, lickspittlery, compulsion to please... I value none of these things. From the moment my envoys came for you, the terms of your existence changed."{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}{/g}

traits.locale_text: {n}Theodora ríe, burlona.{/n} «Has cedido la ocasión que se te ha ofrecido y mostrado un carácter pusilánime, incluso para alguien de rango inferior. Es cierto que este problema aqueja a todos los que se acostumbran a vivir en manos del {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. Jerarquías inmutables, obediencia absoluta, lamebotas obligados a satisfacer... olvida todo eso. Desde que mis emisarios han acudido en tu busca, las viejas reglas han dejado de aplicársete».

languages.text: {n}シオドーラは嘲笑する。{/n}「お前は、従順であったがために、せっかくのチャンスを棒に振ってしまった。確かに、このような傾向は皇帝に仕えるすべての者に等しくあるものだ。絶対的なヒエラルキー、絶対的な服従、媚びへつらう態度、賛美の強制…私はこれらのどれにも価値を認めない。私の使節がお前を迎えに来た瞬間から、お前の存在の条件は変わったのだ」
languages.original_text: {n}Theodora scoffs.{/n} "You have ceded the opening that was offered to you in a woeful display of meekness. Admittedly, this tendency is equally strong in all who toil in the Emperor's service. Immutable hierarchy, absolute obedience, lickspittlery, compulsion to please... I value none of these things. From the moment my envoys came for you, the terms of your existence changed."

traits.locale_text: {n}テオドラは嘲笑する。{/n}[あなたは自分に与えられた席を譲り、たとえ格下の者であっても痛ましいほどの柔和さを示しました。確かに、この苦しみは、{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}の支配下で生きることに慣れたすべての者に等しく強いものです。不変の階層、絶対服従、おべっか、人を喜ばせたいという強迫観念…それらすべてを忘れてください。私の使者があなたを迎えに来た瞬間から、古い規則は重要ではなくなりました 」
{n}シオドーラは嘲笑する。{/n}「お前は、従順であったがために、せっかくのチャンスを棒に振ってしまった。確かに、このような傾向は皇帝に仕えるすべての者に等しくあるものだ。絶対的なヒエラルキー、絶対的な服従、媚びへつらう態度、賛美の強制…私はこれらのどれにも価値を認めない。私の使節がお前を迎えに来た瞬間から、お前の存在の条件は変わったのだ」

languages.text: {n}Théodora ricane.{/n} « Vous avez fait preuve d'une soumission consternante en renonçant à l'opportunité qui vous était offerte. À votre décharge, il faut bien reconnaître que c'est une tendance commune à tous ceux qui œuvrent au service de l'Empereur. Hiérarchie immuable, obéissance absolue, flagornerie, besoin de satisfaire... Tout cela n'a aucune espèce d'importance à mes yeux. Dès l'instant où mes émissaires sont venus vous chercher, les conditions de votre existence ont changé du tout au tout. »{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}{/g}
languages.original_text: {n}Theodora scoffs.{/n} "You have ceded the opening that was offered to you in a woeful display of meekness. Admittedly, this tendency is equally strong in all who toil in the Emperor's service. Immutable hierarchy, absolute obedience, lickspittlery, compulsion to please... I value none of these things. From the moment my envoys came for you, the terms of your existence changed."{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}{/g}

traits.locale_text: {n}Théodora ricane.{/n} « Vous avez renoncé à l'offre qui vous a été faite en faisant preuve d'une soumission déplorable, même pour une personne de rang inférieur. À votre décharge, il faut bien reconnaître que ce comportement est courant chez ceux qui évoluent sous le joug de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. Hiérarchie immuable, obéissance absolue, flagornerie, besoin de satisfaire... Oubliez tout ça. Dès l'instant où mes envoyés sont venus vous chercher, les anciennes règles ont cessé d'avoir de l'importance. »

languages.text: {n}Theodora verzieht spöttisch das Gesicht.{/n} "Ihr habt die Euch angebotene Gelegenheit mit einem erbärmlichen Anflug von Demut ausgeschlagen. Diese Neigung ist zugegebenermaßen bei allen Dienern des Imperators stark ausgeprägt. Unveränderliche Hierarchie, absoluter Gehorsam, Speichelleckerei, der Wille zu gefallen ... Das alles ist mir nicht wichtig. In dem Moment, als meine Gesandten Euch abholten, änderten sich die Bedingungen Eurer Existenz."{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}{/g}
languages.original_text: {n}Theodora scoffs.{/n} "You have ceded the opening that was offered to you in a woeful display of meekness. Admittedly, this tendency is equally strong in all who toil in the Emperor's service. Immutable hierarchy, absolute obedience, lickspittlery, compulsion to please... I value none of these things. From the moment my envoys came for you, the terms of your existence changed."{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}{/g}

traits.locale_text: {n}Theodora verzieht spöttisch das Gesicht.{/n} "Ihr habt die Euch angebotene Gelegenheit ausgeschlagen und elende Demut gezeigt, selbst für jemanden von geringerem Rang. Diese Neigung ist zugegebenermaßen bei allen stark ausgeprägt, die ihre Existenz im Griff des {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperiums{/g} fristen. Unveränderliche Hierarchie, absoluter Gehorsam, Speichelleckerei, der Wille zu gefallen ... vergesst das alles. Als meine Gesandten Euch abholten, spielten die alten Regeln keine Rolle mehr."

languages.text: {n}Theodora dudak büküyor.{/n} "Sana sunulan fırsatı, acınası bir teslimiyet sergileyerek teptin. Kuşkusuz bu eğilim, İmparator'un hizmetinde kendini tüketen herkesin benliğine sirayet etmiş. Değişmez hiyerarşi, mutlak itaat, dalkavukluk, memnun etme dürtüsü... Benim lügatımda bunların kıymeti yoktur. Temsilcilerim seni almaya geldiği andan itibaren varoluşunun koşulları değişti."{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}{/g}
languages.original_text: {n}Theodora scoffs.{/n} "You have ceded the opening that was offered to you in a woeful display of meekness. Admittedly, this tendency is equally strong in all who toil in the Emperor's service. Immutable hierarchy, absolute obedience, lickspittlery, compulsion to please... I value none of these things. From the moment my envoys came for you, the terms of your existence changed."{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}{/g}

Kuşkusuz bu eğilim, İmparator'un hizmetinde kendini tüketen herkesin benliğine sirayet etmiş. Değişmez hiyerarşi, mutlak itaat, dalkavukluk, memnun etme dürtüsü... {n}Theodora dudak büküyor.{/n} "Sana sunulan fırsatı, acınası bir teslimiyet sergileyerek teptin. Kuşkusuz bu eğilim, İmparator'un hizmetinde kendini tüketen herkesin benliğine sirayet etmiş. Değişmez hiyerarşi, mutlak itaat, dalkavukluk, memnun etme dürtüsü... Benim lügatımda bunların kıymeti yoktur.
